vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Ἀνανίας (WH, Ἁναν-), -α, ὁ (Heb. חֲנַנְיָה),
Ananias;
__1. of Jerusalem: Act.5:1, 3 5:5.
__2. Of Damascus: Act.9:10-13, 17 22:12.
__3. High Priest: Act.23:2 24:1.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabinfos.mediumDef: A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.5.1; married to Sapphira (G4551)
vocabinfos._es_Definition: Ananías: (1) esposo de Safira; (2) discípulo en Damasco; (3) sumo sacerdote judío
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞拿尼亞 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華所恩賜的"
1) 耶路撒冷的一名信徒, 撒非喇的丈夫 (徒 5:1-6)
2) 大馬色的一名信徒 (徒 9:10-18)
3) 一名大祭司 (徒 23:2)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚拿尼亚这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是"耶和华所恩赐的"
1) 耶路撒冷的一名信徒, 撒非喇的丈夫(徒5:1-6)
2) 大马色的一名信徒(徒9:10-18)
3) 一名大祭司(徒23:2)
vocabinfos._vi_Definition: A-na-nia « Đức Chúa Trời ban ơn »

vocabinfos.mediumDef: A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.9.10
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.23.2
